page.title: 12Gretna Gala
page.content: The Gretna and Rigg Gala is an annual summertime event which involves many of the local community.Every year a{ {queen}is chosen from the local teenagers.There are many events such as,{five_a_side football,Junior and {senior 'It's_a_knock _out',male and {female superstar,male and female road {race,pram raceround Gretna and even a {dog show. On Gala Day{decorated {floats}are judged along with{ {cars,bicycles and horses.}There is then a parade through the streets together with{Annan Town Band,a jazz {band and pipe bands.}In the afternoon there is,a{jazz band cmpetition,donkey {derby,childrens sports,side shows,tug {of war,anvil throwing,egg throwing , {balloon throwing,karate display and a {fair.}The day is completed with a{ {buffet dance. }
